attributes.action: explain his reason for reneging on his pledge to allow the British people a referendum .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The contents of the Lisbon Treaty are fundamentally the same as previous treaties which were rejected by Ireland, France and Holland and on which we were promised a referendum. The Prime Minister disgracefully misled the British people and should own up.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
